name: JustTheTemperature
0:
”Alexa, just the temperature”
”Alexa, open just the temperature”
”Alexa, ask just the temperature what the current temperature is”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: just the temperature
des: This skill gives you the current temperature without any of the other information you usually get from Alexa when you ask for the temperature. All temperature data comes from OpenWeatherMap.
